newsitem.title: SPAIN: Agroman-orders pending at end-May up 33 pct yr/yr.
newsitem.headline: Agroman-orders pending at end-May up 33 pct yr/yr.

text.p: Spanish contractor Agroman had orders pending execution totalling 183.0 billion pesetas at the end of May, up 33 percent year-on-year, the firm said on Friday.
In his address to the annual shareholders' meeting, chairman Santiago Bergarche said results this year would be "significant...and from 1998, they will be in line with (the firm's) main competitors."
Results this year are expected to be around one percent of turnover, the chairman added.
